verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and prophesy against <S%H5012>it<s%>,

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>it<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H2022>Behold<s%>, O mountain <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, I am against <S%H5186>you<s%>, and I will stretch out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H5414>you<s%>, and I will make you <S%H4923>most<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>.
I will <S%H7760>lay<s%> your <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H2723>waste<s%>, and you shall be <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Because you have had a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H342>hatred<s%>, and have <S%H5064>shed<s%> the blood of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H3027>force<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity<s%>, in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> had a <S%H7093>end<s%>:

<S%H2416>Therefore<s%>, as I live, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, I will <S%H6213>prepare<s%> you unto <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H518>you<s%>: since you have not <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>, even <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall pursue <S%H7291>you<s%>.

Thus will I <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%> <S%H8077>most<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>, and cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from it him that passes <S%H5674>out<s%> and him that <S%H7725>returns<s%>.

And I will <S%H4390>fill<s%> his <S%H2022>mountains<s%> with his <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H1389>men<s%>: in your hills, and in your <S%H1516>valleys<s%>, and in all your <S%H650>rivers<s%>, shall they <S%H5307>fall<s%> that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8077>desolations<s%>, and your <S%H5892>cities<s%> shall not <S%H7725>return<s%>: and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Because you have <S%H559>said<s%>, These <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H776>countries<s%> shall be <S%H3423>mine<s%>, and we will possess <S%H3068>it<s%>; whereas the Lord was there:

<S%H2416>Therefore<s%>, as I live, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, I will even <S%H6213>do<s%> according to your <S%H639>anger<s%>, and according to your <S%H7068>envy<s%> which you have <S%H6213>used<s%> out of your <S%H8135>hatred<s%> against <S%H3045>them<s%>; and I will make myself known among <S%H8199>them<s%>, when I have judged you.

And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and that I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> all your <S%H5007>blasphemies<s%> which you have <S%H559>spoken<s%> against the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, They are laid <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, they are <S%H5414>given<s%> us to <S%H402>consume<s%>.
Thus with your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> you have <S%H1431>boasted<s%> against <S%H6280>me<s%>, and have multiplied your <S%H1697>words<s%> against <S%H8085>me<s%>: I have heard them.
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; When the whole <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices<s%>, I will <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H8077>desolate<s%>.

As you did <S%H8057>rejoice<s%> at the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because it was <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, so will I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H8077>you<s%>: you shall be desolate, O <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, and all <S%H123>Edom<s%>, even all of <S%H3045>it<s%>: and they shall know that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
